leve.name: A Little Constructive Exorcism
leve.description: New defensive positions are planned to counter the Garlean impingement on the Twelveswood. The Blue Badgers, the engineers of the Order of the Twin Adder, march for the site to begin erecting the fortifications. Precede them there and slay the creatures who would surely prove a nuisance to the brave Badgers' noble endeavor.
leve.client: The Order of the Twin Adder Blue Badgers
